content.raw:
I like the icon, it's obvious that it's there, so you'll find the feature, but small enough that it doesn't clutter the interface. Big enough that it's usable, but small enough that it isn't in the way for labs that don't switch between modes often.

I've found myself using the repeat last functionality in some cases, but will still use the repeat all option in a lot of cases. I'm happy with this feature now.

I'm happy to merge this in if @philipstarkey and @spielman don't have any complaints.
